scripts.deploy:celo-alfajores: pnpm prepare:deploy celo-alfajores && pnpm codegen && graph deploy --studio metrom-blocks-celo-alfajores
scripts.deploy:gnosis: pnpm prepare:deploy gnosis && pnpm codegen && graph deploy --studio metrom-blocks-gnosis
scripts.deploy:holesky: pnpm prepare:deploy holesky && pnpm codegen && graph deploy --studio metrom-blocks-holesky
scripts.deploy:arbitrum: pnpm prepare:deploy arbitrum-one && pnpm codegen && graph deploy --studio metrom-blocks-arbitrum
scripts.deploy:mantle-sepolia: pnpm prepare:deploy mantle-sepolia && pnpm codegen && graph build && graph deploy metrom-mantle-sepolia-blocks -l 0.0.1 --node https://subgraph-api.mantle.xyz/deploy --ipfs https://subgraph-api.mantle.xyz/ipfs
scripts.deploy:mantle: pnpm prepare:deploy mantle && pnpm codegen && graph build && graph deploy metrom-mantle-blocks -l 0.0.1 --node https://subgraph-api.mantle.xyz/deploy --ipfs https://subgraph-api.mantle.xyz/ipfs
